source_sentence: 阿闍梨大曼荼攞灌頂儀軌
translation: Ritual Procedure for the Consecration of the Great Maṇḍala of the Ajātaśrī

source_sentence: 爾時，金剛手白佛言：「世尊！
translation: At that point, Vajrapāṇi said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有諸善男子、善女人入此大悲藏生大曼荼羅王三昧耶者，彼獲幾所福德聚？」
translation: If good men and good women enter this great store of compassion and give rise to the great concentration of the king of maṇḍalas, how much merit will they attain?"

source_sentence: 如是說已，佛告金剛手言：「祕密主！
translation: After speaking thus, the Buddha addressed Vajrapāṇi, saying, "Master of Secrets!

source_sentence: 從初發心乃至成如來所有福德聚，是善男子、善女人福德聚與彼正等。
translation: From the first arousal of the intention to become a tathāgata, this is a stock of merit of good men and good women that's exactly the same as theirs.

source_sentence: 祕密主！
translation: Master of Secrets!

source_sentence: 以此法門當如是知：彼善男子、善女人從如來口生，佛心之子。
translation: This is how you should know through this teaching: "That good man or good woman arises from the Tathāgata's mouth and is a son of the Buddha's mind.

source_sentence: 若是善男子、善女人所在方所，即為有佛施作佛事。
translation: If this is a good man or woman who goes to a place, that's a buddha who does buddha-works for the buddhas.

source_sentence: 是故，祕密主！
translation: Therefore, Bhadrapāla!

source_sentence: 若樂欲供養佛者，當供養此善男子、善女人。
translation: "If someone wants to make offerings to the Buddha, they must make offerings to this good man or woman.

source_sentence: 若樂欲見佛，即當觀彼能摧破魔軍、利樂一切。
translation: If you wish to see the Buddha, you should observe that he is capable of destroying armies of Māra and bringing benefit to all.

source_sentence: 是故，汝等欲得一切如來真實智慧者，應當一心修行此法，能速成就一切智故。」
translation: Therefore, those of you who want to attain the true wisdom of all tathāgatas should single-mindedly cultivate this teaching, for it will quickly accomplish omniscience."

source_sentence: (《法華》云「淨心信敬佛」；《淨名》云「從無量功德智慧生」)加持五色線索，繫其左臂。
translation: (The Lotus says, "Purify your mind and believe in and revere the Buddha," and the Jingming says, "From immeasurable merit and wisdom arises.") He applied a five-colored cord and tied it around his left arm.

source_sentence: 真言曰：「（一）唵摩訶(引)嚩日囉迦嚩遮嚩日哩俱嚕嚩日囉嚩日囉憾」「南無金剛界大聖毘盧遮那如來　南無東方阿閦如來　南無南方寶生如來　南無西方觀自在王如來　南無北方不空成就如來「南無普賢金剛薩埵等盡虛空遍法界微塵剎土中帝綱重重三際一切菩薩摩訶薩。」
translation: He truly said, "(1) Om mahā (citation) vajra rāja vajra chai vajra rāja kuru vajra rāja regrettably." "Namu vajradhātu, the great sage Vairocana Tathāgata of the vajradhātu, Namu Akṣobhya Tathāgata of the east, Namu Baosheng Tathāgata of the south, Namu Avalokitêśvara Tathāgata of the west, Namu Amoghasiddhi Tathāgata of the north, and Namu Samantabhadra of the north, all the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas who end space, pervade the Dharma realm, and pervade the dusty bases and lands in the Di Gang, the three realms in multiple layers."

source_sentence: 次復心念此密語護持諸弟子。
translation: Next, he also mentally recites this esoteric teaching to safeguard his disciples.

source_sentence: 密語曰：「（二）唵(引)(一)　摩訶(引)襪日囉(二合)迦(去)襪遮嚩日哩(二合)矩嚧襪日囉(二合)襪日囉(二合)菡(引)」次加持塗香塗諸弟子掌中。
translation: The secret saying was, "(2) Om (citation needed) (1) Mahā (citation needed) soxhilā (2) ka (go) soxhatsa vajrī (2) kuṅgulo soxhilā (2) soxhilā (2) han (2)." Next, he applied incense to the disciples' palms.

source_sentence: 真言曰：「（三）唵(引)襪日囉(二合)巘弟虐」塗香時告言：「願汝等悉具一切如來戒、定、慧、解脫、解脫知見之香。」
translation: When he applied the incense, he told them, "May you all fully possess the fragrance of the Tathāgatas' precepts, meditation, wisdom, liberation, and knowledge and vision of liberation."

source_sentence: 次加持白華授與弟子。
translation: Next, he bestowed a white lotus on the disciple.

source_sentence: 真言曰：「（四）唵(引)襪日囉(二合)補瑟閉(二合)唵」告言：「願汝等得一切如來無盡相海。」
translation: They truly said, "(4) Om (citation needed) sarjara (2) pauṣṭhim (2) om," and told them, "May you all attain the endless ocean of characteristics of all the Tathāgatas."

source_sentence: 次加持香鑪熏弟子雙手。
translation: Next, he smoked the disciple's hands with a scented censer.

source_sentence: 真言曰：「（五）唵襪日囉(二合)杜(引)閉惡」告言：「願汝等得一切如來無盡大悲滋潤妙色。」
translation: They truly said, "(5) Om sarjara (2) duṣkṛta (2) shut off evil," and told them, "May you attain the marvelous appearance of all the tathāgatas' inexhaustible great compassion that nourishes them."

source_sentence: 次加持燈令弟子視。
translation: Next, he applied the lamp and made his disciples look at it.

source_sentence: 真言曰：「（六）唵襪囉(二合)路(引)計(引)儞翼(二合、引)」告言：「願汝等獲得一切如來等虛空界智慧。」
translation: He spoke, "(6) Om sro (2) lu (citation) kai (citation) nyi (2)," and told them, "May you attain the wisdom of all tathāgatas and other elements of space."

source_sentence: 光明金剛劍真言加持牛五味(乳、酪、蘇、糞、尿相和，澄、嚧漉服之)：「（七）唵嚩日囉(二合)嗢那羯吒」令飲。
translation: The true words of the Vajra Sword of Light are applied to the five flavors of milk, cream, soda, dung, and urine, and they are mixed together, then purified and purified, and they are taken: "(7) Om vajra (2) nakṣatra (2) karṭa" causing him to drink it.

source_sentence: 真言：「（八）唵摩訶入嚩攞吽」次，以摧破一切煩惱、隨煩惱，諸佛甚深智慧金剛劍真言或部心真言加持，烏曇阿說陀齒木十指量，香水洗、塗、熏，纏華於根，以一奉獻一切諸佛，餘與行者。
translation: He then offers one to all the buddhas, destroying all the afflictions and following the afflictions, with the blessing of the true words of the buddhas' profound wisdom, the true words of the ministry, the ten-finger measure of wood from the tooth of the udumbara asura, perfumed, and wrapped in flowers, washed, smeared, and perfumed, and wrapped around the roots, offering one to all the buddhas and giving the rest to the practitioner.

source_sentence: 以不動明加持、一百八如來牙加持。
translation: He bestows the blessing of Akṣobhya and the blessing of the 108 tathāgatas' teeth.

source_sentence: 次授於齒木，却至授戒處嚼小頭，告問：「擲齒木得何方，便是彼方。
translation: Next, he confers the precepts on a log of teeth, then goes back to the place where he was given the precepts and chews the small head, telling him, "Where did he get the log of teeth when he tossed it, and this is the other place.

source_sentence: 聖人告如是偈言：「『汝獲無等利，　　位同於大我。
translation: The sage told him this verse, "You've attained unequalled benefits, and your position is the same as that of the great self.

source_sentence: 一切諸如來，　　此教諸菩薩，　　皆以攝受汝，　　成辦於大事。
translation: All the tathāgatas and bodhisattvas of this teaching have taken you under their wing to accomplish great things.

source_sentence: 汝等於明日，　　當得大乘生。』」
translation: Tomorrow, you will all attain birth in the great vehicle.'"

source_sentence: 擲之，驗其相(令蹲踞坐嚼，面東或北，向外不成就、向內成就。
translation: Throw it away and examine its features (make it squat, sit, chew, face east or north, face outward but not accomplish it, and face inward but accomplish it.

source_sentence: 若遠却夾久，成就東方、上、西、中、南、下，四方多是彼部)。
translation: If he's far away but has been sandwiched for a long time, he'll achieve success to the east, up, west, center, south, and down, and the four directions will mostly be his group.)

source_sentence: 三，結修多羅，當繫等持臂(五色線五佛加持，貫攝萬行，令住等持臂，歷經僧祇令不失壞，故名金剛結)。
translation: Third, he'll tie a sūtra that will wrap around his arm (the five-colored threads and the blessings of the five buddhas will help him incorporate myriad practices and keep him in his arm, which will last through the saṃgha era and not break down; hence, the name Vajra Bonds).

source_sentence: 次，夜行，赤衣覆其首(以真言及不動尊真言加持一百八遍)，掩閉一切諸惡趣門，能開清淨五眼成就。
translation: Next, he walks at night, covering his head with his red robe (one hundred and eight times with his true words and the true words of the Acolyte of Immovability), covering and shutting the doors of all negative rebirths and accomplishing the opening of the five pure eyes.

source_sentence: 結三昧耶契，口授此密言：「（九）三昧耶薩怛鑁(三合)」厶即令竪忍願二度為針，引入壇門中，三遍授此密語曰(金剛鉤真言引入)：「（十）三昧耶吽(引)」應告言：「汝今已入如來眷屬部中，我今令汝生金剛智。
translation: He concludes the samaya protocol and gives this esoteric teaching orally, saying, "(9) Samaya satanta (triple)," and then causes him to erect the needle of the two virtues of forbearance and vow, introduce it into the altar door, and gives this esoteric teaching three times, saying (introducing the true words of the vajra hook), "(10) Samaya un (lead)," and tells him, "Now that you've entered the Tathāgata's retinue, I'm going to give rise to your vajra knowledge.

source_sentence: 汝由此智故，當得一切如來最勝成就，及諸世間、出世間一切悉地事業皆悉成就。
translation: Because of this knowledge, you will attain the most excellent achievements of all the Tathāgatas and the accomplishment of all worldly and supramundane preparatory works.

source_sentence: 汝又不應於未入壇場受灌頂人前說此法事。
translation: You also shouldn't explain this teaching to someone who hasn't yet entered the altar to receive the consecration.

source_sentence: 汝若說者，非但違失汝三昧耶，亦自招殃咎耳。」
translation: If you do, not only will you violate your samaya, but you'll also bring bad fortune on yourself."

source_sentence: 師應堅結金剛薩埵慧契，置弟子頂上，告言：「此是金剛薩埵三昧耶契，汝若輒向未受灌頂人說者，令汝頭破裂。
translation: The teacher should firmly wrap up the Vajrasattva wisdom contract, place it on the disciple's head, and tell him, "This is the Vajrasattva samaya contract; if you speak it lightly to someone who hasn't yet been consecrated, your head will be split open.

source_sentence: 汝於我所莫生輕慢，應當深生敬信。
translation: Don't despise me, but instead give rise to deep respect and faith.

source_sentence: 汝於我身當如金剛薩埵想，我所教誨當盡奉行。
translation: You must think of yourself as a Vajrasattva, and you must completely approve of my teachings.

source_sentence: 若不爾者，自招殃禍，或令中夭、死墮地獄，汝應慎之。」
translation: If you don't, you'll bring misfortune upon yourself, or you'll die young or fall into hell.

source_sentence: 師欲令金剛薩埵入其弟子身心，即結金剛薩埵契，告言：「此是金剛薩埵三昧耶，願入汝身心成無上金剛智。」
translation: Desiring to cause the Vajrasattva to enter his disciple's body and mind, the teacher then formed the Vajrasattva covenant and told him, "This is the Vajrasattva samaya, may it enter your body and mind and become unsurpassed in Vajra knowledge."

source_sentence: 誦此密語曰：「（十一）唵(引)襪日囉(二合、引)吠(引)奢(引)噁」次，結忿怒金剛拳，以忍願二度相鉤，誦上大乘三昧耶百字密語。
translation: Reciting this esoteric phrase, he said, "(11) Om (citation) sarjara (verse) vai (citation) she (citation) na" and then knotted his wrathful vajra fists, hooked them to the two virtues of forbearance and vow, and recited the 100-syllable esoteric phrase of the superior great vehicle samaya.

source_sentence: 唱已，掣開上契。
translation: After reciting it, he switches off the top deed.

source_sentence: 由此密語功能力故，能令弟子入金剛智，證殊勝慧。
translation: Because of the power of this esoteric speech, it can cause his disciples to enter adamantine wisdom and realize exceptional wisdom.

source_sentence: 由此智故，悉能獲得知一切眾生若干種心，能知世間三種事業，能堅固菩提心，能滅一切苦惱、離一切怖畏，一切眾惡不能為害，一切如來同共加持，一切悉地皆悉現前，諸未曾有安樂勝事不求自得。
translation: Because of this knowledge, they'll be able to fully understand the various kinds of minds of all sentient beings, know the three worldly affairs, firmly establish the mind of enlightenment, cease all suffering and anxiety, be free of all fears, be unable to harm all evil, be supported by all tathāgatas together, have all the preparatory stages fully manifested, and attain unprecedentedly pleasant and surpassing things without seeking them.

source_sentence: 「汝當深自慶幸，我今為汝略說功德勝事：於一切地位諸解脫門、神通門、三摩地門、陀羅尼門、波羅蜜門、十力、無畏、不共法等，由此法故悉當獲得，所有未曾見聞百千契經甚深義理自然能解。
translation: "Be deeply fortunate for yourself, for now I'll briefly explain for you the merits and surpassing qualities of the gate of liberation, the gate of supernormal powers, the gate of samādhi, the gate of dhāraṇī, the gate of pāramitā, the ten powers, fearlessness, and the unique qualities that will be attained as a result of these things, and the profound meanings of a hundred thousand sūtras that have never been seen or heard before that you'll be able to naturally understand.

source_sentence: 汝當不久自當證得諸佛真實智慧，何況下劣諸餘悉地？」
translation: You will soon realize the true wisdom of the buddhas yourself, so why should you be inferior to the rest of the attainments?"

source_sentence: 作是語已，次當問言：「汝見何等境界(此下有摧罪明等記之)？
translation: After you say this, you should next ask, "What kind of object do you see (as noted below in the section on destroying crimes)?

source_sentence: 次第摧破諸罪已，復想以諸佛光明淨彼身心。
translation: After he destroys the sins in turn, he also contemplates that he's purifying his body and mind with the brightness of the buddhas.

source_sentence: 四方阿閦鞞等、上方大日如來等，皆放清淨光明；下方想金剛雄(上呼)字放忿怒光明而摧破之。」
translation: Akṣobhya and the others in the four directions and the Tathāgata Mahāvairocana and the others above all emit pure light, and below them, he thinks of the character Vajrāṭṭṭṭa emitting wrathful light and destroying it."

source_sentence: 作是法時，能令彼等必定得見善相，當知彼罪障消滅。
translation: When they do this, it'll surely cause them to see good features, and they'll know that their sins and hindrances have vanished.

source_sentence: 若彼罪極重，不見好相，師應為說真實伽陀，令其覺悟。
translation: If their sins are so serious that they don't see good features, the teacher should explain the true gāthā to make them awaken.

source_sentence: 頌曰：「普賢真身遍一切，　　能為世間自在王，　無始、無終、無生滅，　　性相常住等虛空。
translation: The verse goes, "The true body of Samantabhadra pervades them all, is the sovereign king of the world, has no beginning, no end, and no arising or ceasing, and its nature and characteristics are always abiding in space.

source_sentence: 一切眾生所有心，　　堅固菩提名薩埵，　心住不動三摩地，　　精勤決定名金剛。
translation: All the minds of sentient beings are resolute in their enlightenment and are called sattvas, their minds abide in the samādhi of immovability, and their diligence and determination are called adamantine.

source_sentence: 我今說此誠實言，　　唯願世尊扶本願，　為利眾生諸悉地，　　慈悲哀愍願加持。」
translation: Now, I say these sincere words, "May the Bhagavān support this vow, fulfill it for the benefit of sentient beings, and vouch for it with compassion and sympathy."

source_sentence: 說是語已，復結金剛入契，誦字密語一百八遍。
translation: After speaking these words, he then closed the vajra initiation contract and recited the words one hundred and eight times in a cryptic voice.

source_sentence: 結金剛縛，以禪智度捻檀慧度本間，以進力度少屈相拄是也。
translation: When he forms the vajra binding, he uses his meditation wisdom to cross over, twisting his donor's wisdom to cross over to the origin, and using his strength to advance with few bends to lean on it.

source_sentence: 如是作法已，若不見好相者，但應引入授三昧耶，不應與其灌頂。
translation: After doing so, if he doesn't see good marks, he should simply introduce them to the samaya and not give them a consecration.

source_sentence: 次與當為受此密語三遍：「明莫加便誦加入佛三昧耶明。
translation: Next, he should recite this esoteric teaching three times for his audience, "Moggaliputta, we'll recite the samaya of joining the Buddha.

source_sentence: 「（十二）唵鉢囉(二合、引)底車襪日囉(二合)穀」誦已，令擲其華。
translation: "After reciting the phrase, he causes them to toss their flowers.

source_sentence: 華所著處，便受彼部尊密語，當速成就(花墮佛面、佛眼等尊成就，墮佛中分成就心真言，花墮佛下分成就使者真言)。
translation: Where the lotus lands, it will then receive the esoteric words of that particular person, which will be accomplished quickly (the accomplishment of such honored ones as falling a flower onto the Buddha's face or the Buddha's eye, the accomplishment of falling a flower into the Buddha's midsection, and the accomplishment of falling a flower under the Buddha's section, which is the accomplishment of the messenger's true words).

source_sentence: 次念此密語三遍，令弟子所結三昧耶印於其心上解之。
translation: He then recites this esoteric teaching three times and causes his disciple to place the samaya seal on his mind and untie it.

source_sentence: 密語曰：「(願金剛薩埵常住堅固，加持我心，願授與我一切悉地)」金剛解脫真言：「（十三）唵(引)底瑟佗(二合)襪日囉(二合)儞哩(二合)住(宅反、引)迷(引)婆(去)嚩(二)　舍(引)濕嚩(二合)妬(引)迷婆(去)嚩(三)　紇哩(二合)捺琰(引)迷(引)遏地瑟佗(二合)(四)　薩嚩悉地(土萆反)攝迷(一)鉢囉(二合)拽車(五)　吽(引)賀賀賀賀穀(引)(六)」次誦此密語，解所掩眼物。
translation: The secret saying was, "(May Vajrasattva always remain steadfast, bless my mind, and vow to grant me all the preparations.)" The Vajra Liberation Sutra reads, "(13) Om (citation) tiṣertu (binary) sohiraga (binary) nirri (binary) śramaṇa (binary) śubha (citation) mudrā (citation) vaipā (binary) śramaṇa (citation) śramaṇa (binary) udrā (citation) mudrā (citation) vaipā (citation) ursa (dinary) śramaṇa (citation) śramaṇa (citation) śramaṇa (citation) śramaṇa (citation) śramaṇa (citation) śramaṇa (citation) śramaṇa (citation).

source_sentence: 密語曰：「(所擲花安頂上，薩埵攝受，汝疾成諸悉地)」「（十四）唵(引)(一)　襪日囉(二合)薩怛嚩(二合)娑嚩(二合)延帝(引)儞曳(二合)斫乞蒭(二合、彈舌引半呼上)娜伽(去)吒曩(三)　答播(二合)嚧嗢(半、引)伽(去、引)吒野底(四)　薩嚩惡乞蒭(二合)襪日囉(二合)斫乞蒭(二合)遏努怛爛(引)(六)　係(引)襪日囉(二合)鉢者(七)　(金剛薩埵親自專為汝開於五眼無上金剛眼)」次呼弟子遍示壇中諸部事相。
translation: 密語曰：「(所擲花安頂上，薩埵攝受，汝疾成諸悉地)」「（十四）唵(引)(一)　襪日囉(二合)薩怛嚩(二合)娑嚩(二合)延帝(引)儞曳(二合)斫乞蒭(二合、彈舌引半呼上)娜伽(去)吒曩(三)　答播(二合)嚧嗢(半、引)伽(去、引)吒野底(四)　薩嚩惡乞蒭(二合)襪日囉(二合)斫乞蒭(二合)遏努怛爛(引)(六)　係(引)襪日囉(二合)鉢者(七)　(金剛薩埵親自專為汝開於五眼無上金剛眼)」次呼弟子遍示壇中諸部事相。

source_sentence: 由此法故，為一切如來之所攝受護念，金剛薩埵常住其心中。
translation: Because of this teaching, the Vajrasattva is always present in the minds of all the tathāgatas who take him in and guard his thoughts.

source_sentence: 隨彼所求乃至執金剛身，無不獲得，漸當得入一切如來體性法中(若見此曼荼羅，無量俱胝劫所積眾罪業由是悉除滅)。
translation: Whatever they seek, up to holding the vajra body, they'll invariably attain it, and gradually they'll enter the essential nature of all tathāgatas (if they see this maṇḍala, the numerous sins and karma accumulated over measureless eons will thus be completely removed).

source_sentence: 次當引所灌頂者，左足踏華門、右足踏華心，入天帝方門，華臺上坐，以種種華、塗香、燒香、燈明、幡蓋、清妙音樂而為供養。
translation: Next, he'll lead the person he consecrates to step on the left foot through the flower gate and on the right foot through the flower heart, enter the gate of Indra, sit on the flower dais, and make offerings with various flowers, perfume, burning incense, lamps, banners, and subtle music.

source_sentence: 如不辨者隨力作之。
translation: If someone doesn't discern these things, they do so with their own strength.

source_sentence: 所以爾者，謂此人坐佛位故。
translation: That's why it means this person is sitting in the Buddha's seat.

source_sentence: 復以種種讚詠歌歎，令其殷重生歡喜心。
translation: He also sings and praises various things to make him rejoice.

source_sentence: 說此頌曰：「諸佛覩史下生時，　　釋、梵、龍、神隨侍衛，　種種勝妙吉祥事，　　願汝今時盡能得。
translation: He spoke this verse, "When the buddhas see him descend from this world, the Śākyas, Brahmās, dragons, and spirits accompany and guard him, hoping that you'll attain all of the various wonderful and auspicious things that he has now.

source_sentence: 迦毘羅衛誕釋宮，　　龍王霔沐甘露水，　諸天供養吉祥事，　　願汝灌頂亦如是。
translation: Kapilavastu gave birth to the palace of Śākyamuni, the dragon king bathed it in nectar, the gods made offerings of auspicious things, and may your consecration be likewise.

source_sentence: 金剛座上為群生，　　後夜降魔成正覺，　現諸希有吉祥事，　　願汝此座悉能成。
translation: On the adamantine throne for all sentient beings, subduing Māra in the latter part of the night to achieve perfect enlightenment, may you achieve all the rare and auspicious things that arise from this throne.

source_sentence: 波羅奈苑河莊嚴，　　為五仙人開妙法，　成就無量吉祥事，　　願汝今時盡獲得。
translation: Varanai Park River Adornment, opening the wonderful Dharma for five sages, accomplishes measureless auspicious deeds, may you attain them all now.

source_sentence: 諸佛大悲方便海，　　普利法界眾生海，　盡未來際無疲倦，　　四無礙智汝當得。」
translation: The buddhas' ocean of great compassionate skillful means universally benefits the sea of sentient beings in the Dharma realm, and you will attain the four unhindered cognitions without tire throughout the future."

source_sentence: 若更有餘讚頌，隨意作之，勸發勝心，令生利喜。
translation: If there's another hymn, make it as you like, encouraging a superior mind and causing it to give rise to benefit and joy.

source_sentence: 次應與其灌頂。
translation: Next, he should give him a consecration.

source_sentence: 先想弟子頂有字，放大光焰，熾然赫奕。
translation: First, imagine that there's a word on the disciple's head, and it's a magnificent, blazing flame.

source_sentence: 又想弟子心中有月輪，月輪內有八葉蓮華，於華臺上亦有字。
translation: Also, imagine that there's a moon in the disciple's mind, and inside the moon there are eight-leaf lotus flowers, and on the lotus dais there are words.

source_sentence: 若得金剛部，於字內想有五股金剛，餘部可知。
translation: If he attains the vajra group, he'll conceive of five-pronged vajras inside the word, and the rest can be understood.

source_sentence: 若得大日，即想窣堵波，應想己身如毘盧遮那像。
translation: If he attains the Vairocana school, then he should imagine a stūpa and should think of himself as Vairocana's image.

source_sentence: 執弟子所得部瓶，各想其部物體在瓶水內，如金剛蓮等，各令結其所得部契。
translation: Holding the vial obtained by the disciple, he each imagines that the object of his order is inside the vial's water, like a vajra lotus, and so forth, and he makes each one tie the bonds of the order he's obtained.

source_sentence: 置於頂上誦本部密語七遍，而用灌頂。
translation: They place it on top of their heads, recite the secret words of the order seven times, and then use the consecration.

source_sentence: 真言曰(金剛部灌頂)：「（十五）唵(引)(一)　襪日囉薩怛嚩(二合、引)避詵(去)者吽　唵(引)襪日囉喇怛曩(二合、引)避詵者怛[口*洛](二合)唵(引)襪日囉(二合)鉢納磨(二合、引)避詵者紇哩(二合、引)唵(引)襪日囉(二合)羯磨(引)避詵者惡」於彼額上想有攞字，色如真金；於兩目上各有羅(上)字，其色如火，上有光焰；其兩足間想種種色，為法輪相，八輻莊嚴。
translation: The true saying is (Vajrasattva consecration), "(15) Om (citation) (1) Socksirasattva (2) (1) Socksirasattva (2) (1) Śaṃson (2) Un (citation) Om (citation) Socksirasattva (2) (2) Lattanān (2) (citation) Śaṃson (2) Tantra (2) (2) Om (citation) Socksirasattva (2) (2) Pāṇḍamā (2) (citation) Śaṃson (2) Uyghurī (2) Om (citation) Socksirasattva (2) (2) Karma (citation) Śaṃson (3)".

source_sentence: 次誦金剛薩埵心真言，加持塗香塗彼胸前。
translation: Next, he recites the true words of Vajrasattva's mind and applies scented incense to his chest.

source_sentence: 所以作法加持者，為令弟子如金剛薩埵故。
translation: This is because it's a method of blessing to make his disciple resemble Vajrasattva.

source_sentence: 次結大日印，念本真言，置契於彼心上，次額、次喉、次頂上。
translation: Next, he sets the great sun mudrā, recites this true chant, and places it on his heart, then on his forehead, then on his throat, and then on his head.

source_sentence: 即應諦想一切如來祕密勝上頭冠加彼頭上，即結如上四種鬘印，各隨其部法以繫其額。
translation: He then should truly contemplate the Tathāgata's secret crown of superiority placed on his head, and he should wrap the four garlands as described above, tying them around his forehead according to the rules of each school.

source_sentence: 若作阿闍梨灌頂法者，應次第如上法遍用五瓶，以四種鬘鱗次繫其額上已。
translation: If someone performing a consecration ceremony for a preceptor should use the five vials in order as described above, then they should wrap the four kinds of garlands and scales around their foreheads in turn.

source_sentence: 次師以觀羽執五股跋折羅授其雙手，應以種種方便言詞開誘安慰，為說頌曰：「諸佛金剛灌頂儀，　　汝已如法灌頂竟，　為成如來體性故，　　汝應受此金剛杵。」
translation: Next, the teacher gives him a five-pronged vajra in his hands, encourages and comforts him with various skillful words, and speaks a verse that says, "The buddhas have consecrated you with the vajra, you've consecrated him according to the teaching, and in order to realize the Tathāgata's essential nature, you should accept this vajra and mortar."

source_sentence: 誦此偈已，真言曰：「（十六）唵(引)(一)　襪日囉(二合、引)地鉢底(二)　微怛嚩(二合、引)避詵(去)者彌(三)　底瑟侘(二合)襪日囉(二合)三摩耶薩怛鑁」復收取金剛杵。
translation: After reciting this verse, he spoke the true words, "(16) Om (citation) (1) Soxhilā (2) Dibodi (2) Weitanyan (2) Aotearoa (2) Śanaiya (3) Tissaiphala (2) Soxhilā (2) Samaya Satantaṃbhava" and then he received the vajra.

source_sentence: 若是寶部者，又跋折羅上想有寶珠，餘部傚此。
translation: If this is the Jewel School, then the conception of a precious pearl on Vajra should be followed by the rest of the School.

source_sentence: 誦前真言時，應改初句金剛字為寶珠，餘部準此。
translation: When reciting the preceding true verse, you should change the first phrase of the vajra to a jewel, and the rest of the order follows this example.

source_sentence: 次於弟子本名上加金剛字，依名呼之。
translation: Next, he adds the word vajra to the disciple's original name and calls him by that name.

source_sentence: 應誦此真言：「（十七）唵(一)　襪日囉(二合)薩怛嚩(二合、引)避詵(去)者(引)彌(二)　襪日囉(二合)曩麼(引、入)避曬訖帝(三)　系襪日囉　曩(引)麼(引)(四)」又以香華、種種供具供養所灌頂者，師應執小金剛杵子，如治眼法拭其兩目，而告之言：「善男子！
translation: You should recite this true chant, "(17) Om (1) śoṅirala (2) satanta (2) Ṛṣanta (2) śoṅirala (2) anāmā (3) śoṅketa (3) śoṅketa (3) Ṛṣanta (4)" and then offer incense, flowers, and various offerings to the person he consecrated, the teacher should take a small vajra pounder, wipe his eyes as if it were an eye treatment, and tell him, "Good man!

source_sentence: 世間醫王能除眼翳；今日諸佛、如來為汝開無明翳亦復如是，為令汝得金剛智慧眼，見法實相故。」
translation: The world's healing kings remove cataracts in the eyes; today, the buddhas and tathāgatas will likewise open the cataracts of ignorance for you in order to give you the adamantine eye of wisdom that sees the true characteristics of dharmas."

source_sentence: 次復執鏡令其觀照，為顯諸法性相空寂。
translation: Next, he held the mirror and made it look into it to reveal the emptiness of the nature and characteristics of all dharmas.

source_sentence: 說伽陀曰：「一切諸法性，　　垢淨不可得，　非實亦非虛，　　皆從因緣現。
translation: He said, "The natures of all dharmas are unsullied and pure, not real and not false, and they all arise from causes and conditions.

source_sentence: 應當知諸法，　　自性無所依，　汝今真佛子，　　廣利諸眾生。」
translation: You should know that all dharmas have their own nature and no basis, and now you really are the son of the Buddha, extensively benefiting all sentient beings."

source_sentence: 師於弟子當生恭敬，以此人能紹諸佛種性故。
translation: The teacher should revere his disciple because this person can reveal the seed natures of the buddhas.

source_sentence: 師應授以商佉而告之言：「自今已後，諸佛法輪汝應轉之，當吹無上法螺，令大法聲遍一切處，不應於此法中而生疑怖。
translation: The teacher should give him the title of Śākyamuni and tell him, "From now on, you should turn the buddhas' Dharma wheels, blow the supreme conch of the Dharma, and cause the great sound of the Dharma to reach everywhere; you shouldn't have doubts or fears about this Dharma.

source_sentence: 於諸密語究竟清淨修行理趣，汝應廣為眾生方便開示。
translation: You should also explain to sentient beings in detail the principle of the cultivation of the ultimate purification of the esoteric teachings.

source_sentence: 善男子諦聽：若能如是修者，一切如來皆悉知汝能報佛恩。
translation: Listen closely, good sons: If you can thus cultivate it, all the tathāgatas will know that you can repay the Buddha's kindness.

source_sentence: 是故，於一切時處，一切持金剛者之所衛護，令汝安樂。」
translation: Therefore, at all times and places, you'll be guarded by all those who bear the vajra, so that you'll be comfortable."

source_sentence: 次應引起至大壇前，為說三昧耶令其堅固，告言：「善男子！
translation: Next, he should cause them to go up to the large altar, preach the samaya for them, and make them resolute, telling them, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝應堅守正法，設遭逼迫苦惱乃至斷命，不應捨離修菩提心。
translation: "You should firmly adhere to the right teaching, and even if you're subjected to persecution and suffering, even if your life is cut short, you shouldn't abandon the cultivation of the aspiration for enlightenment.

source_sentence: 於求法人及於財物不應慳悋，於諸眾生少不利益事亦不應作。
translation: You shouldn't be stingy about seeking gain or possessions, and you shouldn't do anything that's least beneficial to sentient beings.

source_sentence: 此是最上句義、聖所行處，我今為汝具足說竟，汝應隨順如說修行。」
translation: Now, after I've fully explained this supreme statement and the noble position of practice for you, you should follow and cultivate it as I've explained it."

source_sentence: 弟子應自慶幸，合掌頂禮。
translation: The disciple rejoiced in himself and bowed his head with his palms together.

source_sentence: 又執五股金剛杵而授與之，告言：「此是諸佛體性，金剛薩埵手所執者，汝應堅護禁戒，常受持之。」
translation: He then took the five-pronged vajra and presented it to him, telling him, "This is the essence of the buddhas and is held by the hand of Vajrasattva, so you should firmly guard the precepts and always uphold them."

source_sentence: 弟子受已，授此決定要誓密語，令其誦之。
translation: After accepting it, the disciple was given this esoteric statement of a definite vow and told to recite it.

source_sentence: 密語曰：「（十八）唵(一)(引)　薩嚩怛他(引)蘖多悉地襪日囉(二合)三摩耶底瑟佗(二合)(二)　翳娑怛嚩(二合、引)(三)　馱囉耶彌(四)　襪日囉(二合)薩怛嚩(二合)(五)　呬呬呬呬吽」如是作法己，所有一切曼拏囉祕密三昧耶智師應教授。
translation: The secret words were, "(18) Om (1) (citation needed) sarva-tantra (citation needed) tiller siddhi sarjara (2) (2) samayatissa (2) (2) yo sattva (2) (3) dhāraṇyamī (4) sarva-tantra (2) (5) sarva-tantra (2) (5) sarva-tantra (2) (5) sarva-tantra (2) (6) sarva-tantra (2) (7) sarva-tantra (2) (8)." After thus performing the ritual, the wise teacher of all the maṇḍalas' esoteric samādhis should teach it.

source_sentence: 若弟子於三昧耶有退失者，師應遮制，勿令毀壞。
translation: If the disciple ever falls back on that samaya, the teacher should restrain him and not allow him to disrupt it.

source_sentence: 弟子於師應恭敬尊重，莫見師短、於同學所莫生嫌恨。
translation: The disciple should respect and venerate his teacher, not seeing his teacher's shortcomings, and not getting hostile toward his fellow students.

source_sentence: 應告之言：「汝於一切眾生常生慈愍，哀矜示誨，莫生厭離。」
translation: They should tell him, "Always have compassion for all sentient beings, show them compassion, and don't become disillusioned with them."

source_sentence: 為說偈言：「三界極重罪，　　不過於厭離，　汝於貪欲處，　　莫生厭離心。」
translation: He spoke a verse for them, saying, "The three realms are extremely serious crimes, but it's not until you become disillusioned that you mustn't become disillusioned with them in the place of desire."

source_sentence: 次欲令弟子堅持歡喜故，復說偈曰：「此等三昧耶，　　諸佛為汝說，　守持善愛護，　　當如保身命。」
translation: Next, wanting to cause the disciple to persist in rejoicing, he again spoke the verse, "These samayas, which the buddhas have taught for you, are well-maintained, well-admired, and will be like preserving your own life."

source_sentence: 弟子受師教己，頂禮師足，白言：「如師教誨，我誓修行。」
translation: Accepting his teacher's teaching, the disciple bowed his head at his teacher's feet and said, "As my teacher taught, I vow to practice."

source_sentence: 迴向發願：「弟子某甲等向者己來於大悲胎藏大曼荼羅前聽聞正法，生淨信心。
translation: Returning to the teacher, he vowed, "I have come to hear the right teaching from someone who has dedicated himself to the great womb world maṇḍala of great compassion, and I have developed pure faith.

source_sentence: 稽請聖賢海會聖眾，歸依三寶，懺除罪垢，受佛淨戒。
translation: We invited the noble assembly of sages to rely on the Three Treasures, confessed and removed the stain of our sins, and accepted the Buddha's pure precepts.

source_sentence: 投華有緣，蒙聖攝受，已得灌頂金剛職號。
translation: He threw himself into the lotus with the right conditions, was taken in by the sages, and received the consecration of the vajra title.

source_sentence: 隨賢聖位——功德無邊，塵沙叵算——總將迴施法界眾生，願皆離苦、得安穩樂，捨邪歸正、發菩提心，行菩薩道永不退轉，於當來世一時成佛。」
translation: Following the noble stages of goodness - whose merit is limitless and incalculable in number of dust motes - I will always bestow it on sentient beings in the Dharma realm, wishing that they all escape suffering, attain peace and happiness, abandon wrong and return to right, arouse the mind of enlightenment, practice the bodhisattva path without ever turning back, and become buddhas in a single moment in a future life."

source_sentence: 金剛界大乘現證甚深祕密瑜伽大曼荼羅大悲無礙大灌頂戒儀　消除無明妄三業，　　現得薩埵心月輪，　決定不退三密行，　　自他圓滿成悉地。
translation: The Vajradhātu great vehicle now realizes the profound, esoteric yoga, the great maṇḍala, the great compassionate, unhindered great consecration, the precepts, the three karmic activities of ignorance and delusion, the moon wheel of the bodhisattva's mind, the three mysterious practices of nonretrogression, and the accomplishment of the completion of self and others.

source_sentence: 寬政十二年庚申晚秋，為充足豐山印刻之未滿，據相承之本，且讐挍四五之別本而點之。
translation: In the late autumn of Genshen in the twelfth year of Kanzō's reign, I relied on the text that had been inherited from him, and I also criticized the four or five separate texts and ordered them to be copied.

source_sentence: 河南藥樹山沙門真常誌
translation: Henan Yakushū sangsamen Zenjō zhi

source_sentence: 享和改元辛酉年五月，更以京師智積院之本挍整。
translation: In the fifth month of the year henghe reincarnated, he also used the capital's Zhizheyuan's text to rectify the situation.

source_sentence: 彼奧批云：「右阿闍梨灌頂儀軌一卷，梵文句義舊本所無，今守師授，私加書之，但厥句義，全依四卷略出經註。
translation: He wrote, "The right-hand version of the Ritual Procedure for the Consecration of Ajātaśatru is a volume of Sanskrit phrases and meanings that were not in the old text, but which was privately written down by the Shou Shiji, except for the phrases and meanings, which are based on the notes to the four-fascicle Abridged Sutra.

source_sentence: 繕寫之次披閱過數，文苑蕪穢，義路不通。
translation: After reviewing it several times, I found that the text was soiled that the path of its meaning was impassable.

source_sentence: 推之，祕其事相往往爛脫，因以菅窺猥點一班。」
translation: If we look into it, we'll find that its secrets are often rotten, so we'll use them to obscurely point out a group."

source_sentence: 負識遮梨希下雌黃云：「元祿庚午三年中秋念有三日」內州教興徒慧光志(行年二十五)：「如是，梵文句義後之增加，然傳寫久間闕句義，或唯有梵脫漢譯，待復挍善本。」
translation: The negative consciousness Cārīśas Haṃghârāma: "Three days after the mid-autumn recitation in the third year of Genroku's reign," said Neijo Kyoheito Huiguang Zhi (practice year twenty-five): "Thus, the Sanskrit text increased in number after the sentence and meaning, but the transmission had been missing for a long time, so perhaps there was only a Sanskrit-Han translation, to be checked again for a good copy."

source_sentence: 豐山　總持院沙門快道識（一）（二）（三）（四）（五）（六）（七）（八）（九）（一〇）（一一）（一二）（一三）（一四）（一五）（一六）（一七）（一八）
